description.en:
A fantastic duo of a political master and a complete novice!

I’m Gu Yeongjin, a six-term congressman — the pinnacle of South Korea’s political world, the nation’s hope!
One fateful day in 2008, betrayed by my closest aides, I faced a special investigation and chose to end my own life.
When I opened my eyes… it was Seoul, 10 years in the past?!

Now a ghost, no one can see me or hear my voice.
No one... except one person, Cha Jaerim, a 25-year-old Level 9 civil servant.

No connections, no money, stuck in miserable circumstances...
But look at that ambition, that fire in his eyes... I like it! Fine. I’ll make him my partner.

“You need to go into politics.”

And I’ll get my revenge.

A political genius ghost, Gu Yeongjin, teams up with a clueless rookie, Cha Jaerim, for the ultimate combo in
<May the Congressman Protect You>

The reaper loves seeing the cries of humans before swinging down his scythe to reap their souls. He lives for the hunt of humans souls before their passing. Yet one night, he encounters a dying girl with flowers blooming in her room looking back at him with a smile.

description.en:
Cyan Vert, illegitimate son of the Duke and the empire's greatest assassin, is betrayed by the righteous brother whose shadow he's always lived in. But just before the fatal blow strikes his throat, Cyan awakes to find he's just a boy again. The young lord has been reborn, and this time, he's not going to live in anyone's shadow!

---
Cyan Vert, the best assassin of the continent, meets a pitiful death after having been betrayed by his own brother, whom he had trusted all his life.

"If I were given another chance at life, I would live it differently. I would only trust myself, and achieve all the things I want on my own without serving anyone else but myself."

That is how he was given a second chance at life. Cyan Vert, a shadow who lived for others, is no more. He will now pave a path on his own, for only him!

This lighthearted romantic comedy follows the daily lives of these two friends and rivals on a journey that, for now, seems to be heading everywhere but love.

女子高生・三好藍美（みよしあいみ）と染谷波（そめたになみ）。二人の間で話題にのぼるのは、いつだって同じクラスの「霧尾（きりお）くん」のこと。
友人でありライバルでもある二人の日常を描く、ラブまではまだたどり着けそうにない一方通行ラブコメディー。

description.en: After falling into the sea and going missing, Woo Young-jang returns to civilization after spending 7 years on a deserted island! His body has become firm and muscular, he can now communicate with all sorts of animals and even employ their special abilities. However, incidents and accidents seem to follow him wherever he goes. Will Young-jang be able to survive in the city, which is said to be even more terrifying than the jungle?
description.ko:
바다에 빠져 실종된 후, 무인도에서 7년 만에 살아 돌아온 우영장의 좌충우돌 문명 적응기!
그의 몸은 단단한 근육질로 변했고 온갖 동물과의 의사소통은 물론, 특별한 능력까지 구사하며 사건사고가 끊이질 않는다.
과연 영장은 밀림보다 무섭다는 도시에서 살아남을 수 있을까?

altTitles.ja: ワンピース

description.en:
Gol D. Roger, a man referred to as the "Pirate King," is set to be executed by the World Government. But just before his demise, he confirms the existence of a great treasure, One Piece, located somewhere within the vast ocean known as the Grand Line. Announcing that One Piece can be claimed by anyone worthy enough to reach it, the Pirate King is executed and the Great Age of Pirates begins.  
  
Twenty-two years later, a young man by the name of Monkey D. Luffy is ready to embark on his own adventure, searching for One Piece and striving to become the new Pirate King. Armed with just a straw hat, a small boat, and an elastic body, he sets out on a fantastic journey to gather his own crew and a worthy ship that will take them across the Grand Line to claim the greatest status on the high seas.

---

**Note:**  
**Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, English fan translations of One Piece are unable to be posted at this time. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-piece) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US). The three most recent chapters can also be read on MangaPlus for free by clicking the chapter links below.**

---
- **The Best-Selling Manga in History**
- **Won the 41st Japan Cartoonists Association Award Grand Prize alongside Neko Darake in 2012** 
- **Received the Kumamoto Prefecture Honorary Prize in 2018**
description.es: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.ru: Последние слова, произнесённые Королем Пиратов Гол Д. Роджером перед казнью, вдохновили многих выйти в море: «Мои сокровища? Я завещаю их тому, кто сможет их найти. Ищите! Я все оставил в одном месте!». Лишённые сна и покоя люди ринулись на Гранд Лайн, самое опасное место в мире. Так началась великая эра пиратов… Но с каждым годом романтиков становилось все меньше, их постепенно вытесняли прагматичные пираты-разбойники, которым награбленное добро было куда ближе, чем какие-то «никчёмные мечты». Но вот, одним прекрасным днем, семнадцатилетний Монки Д. Луффи исполнил заветную мечту детства - отправился в море. Его цель — ни много, ни мало стать новым Королём Пиратов. За достаточно короткий срок юному капитану удаётся собрать команду, состоящую из не менее амбициозных искателей приключений. И пусть ими движут совершенно разные устремления, главное, этим ребятам важны не столько деньги и слава, сколько куда более ценное – принципы и верность друзьям. И ещё – служение Мечте. Что же, пока по Гранд Лайн плавают такие люди, Великая Эра Пиратов всегда будет с нами!
description.uk:
Король піратів Ґолд Роджер буде страчений Світовим урядом. Прямо перед смертю він підтвердив існування великого скарбу «Ван Піс», який знаходиться десь на величезному морі Ґранд Лайн. Як тільки Роджер сказав, що будь-хто гідний досягти Ван Пісу може забрати його собі, його стратили, і почалася Велика ера піратів.

Двадцять два роки потому, молодий хлопець на ім’я Монкі Д. Луффі готовий почати свою пригоду по пошуку Ван Пісу та здобуванню титулу Короля піратів. Маючи при собі солом’яну шапку, невеличкий човен та еластичне тіло, він вирушає у неймовірну подорож, щоб зібрати собі команду та хороший корабель, який зможе пронести їх через весь Ґранд Лайн, щоб стати найвеличнішими в усіх морях.
description.es-la: Hace veintidós años, el legendario pirata, Gold D. Roger fue ejecutado. Sus últimas palabras fueron que su tesoro conocido como "One Piece" estaba escondido en algún lugar dentro del vasto océano conocido como Grand Line. Esto dio inicio a la Era de los Piratas. Ahora, Monkey D. Luffy, un joven que, inspirado por su ídolo de la infancia emprende su viaje buscando el One Piece y convertirse en el Rey de los Piratas.
description.pt-br: One Piece começa quando Gol D. Roger, o Rei Dos Piratas que possuiu tudo nesse mundo, antes de ser executado, diz que escondeu o seu tesouro em algum lugar da Grand Line, um oceano extremamente perigoso. Desde então muitos piratas se aventuram pela Grand Line para tentar encontrar o tesouro chamado One Piece. Um deles é Monkey D. Luffy, o garoto que, acidentalmente, comeu uma das Akuma No Mi, a Gomu Gomu No Mi (Fruta da Borracha), e agora ele pode esticar seu corpo como se fosse uma borracha. A jornada dele começa atrás de companheiros e um barco, que ele vai conseguindo pouco a pouco, pois tem um objetivo: Ser o Rei Dos Piratas!!

altTitles.ja: 閃光少女

description.en: Hamano was an aspiring photographer who has assumed the role of adviser of high school photo department. With is devotion, he brings other members around him, especially Hikari. Meanwhile, the road to professional photography starts to open in front of the Hamano again…

High school student Li Huowang possesses an ability: whenever he closes his eyes, he enters a bizarre cultivation world. In that strange world, he is captured by someone who calls him “Master” and is made into a living medicine—a human cauldron that could be turned into a pill at any moment.

In the real world, however, Li Huowang is a mentally ill patient living in a psychiatric hospital, unable to attend school. The doctors tell him that the bizarre cultivation world is nothing but a hallucination.

Now, caught between reality and illusion, truth and lies, Li Huowang breaks down, crying and shouting:
“Mom, I really can’t tell what’s real anymore!”
description.vi: Học sinh trung học Lý Hỏa Vượng sở hữu khả năng chỉ cần nhắm mắt là có thể đi đến một thế giới tu tiên kỳ quái. Trong thế giới kỳ quái đó, cậu bị một người được gọi là "Sư phụ" bắt đi làm một dược nhân, có thể bị luyện thành đan dược bất cứ lúc nào. Còn trong thế giới thực, Lý Hỏa Vượng là một bệnh nhân tâm thần sống trong bệnh viện tâm thần, không thể đi học được nữa. Bác sĩ nói với cậu rằng, thế giới tu tiên kỳ quái đó chỉ là ảo giác của cậu mà thôi. Giờ đây, thật thật giả giả, giả giả thật thật, Lý Hỏa Vượng bật khóc trong tuyệt vọng và hét lên: “Mẹ ơi, con thật sự không phân biệt nổi nữa!
description.pt-br: Li Huowang, um estudante do ensino médio, possui uma habilidade peculiar: sempre que fecha os olhos, ele entra em um mundo de cultivo bizarro. Nesse mundo estranho, ele é capturado por alguém que o chama de “Mestre” e acaba transformado em uma medicina viva — um humano…

altTitles.ja: 私は選ばれない

description.en:
Although her marriage was arranged by her parents, Chloe, the daughter of a count, had deeply loved her fiancé, Ernest, the eldest heir of the Ordrand Marquis family, since childhood. However, she is struck by the shocking reality when Ernest decides to break off their engagement and choose her younger sister, Emily, instead.
Amid the pain of betrayal and heartbreak, Lionel, a young duke from the renowned Cislay family, suddenly appears and proposes marriage to her without any warning.

altTitles.vi: Ta Sáng Tạo Truyền Thuyết Đô Thị
Ta Ở Tokyo Sáng Tạo Truyền Thuyết Đô Thị
Ta, Sáng Tạo Ra Đô Thị Truyền Thuyết

description.en: The protagonist Yuan Zhenji crossed to the parallel world of Jiangshi, and found that this world was full of various horror and weirdness, and ordinary humans were as fragile as paper in front of them. He used a notebook called "Urban Legend Records" to create urban legends that affect reality, punish criminals and contain weirdness, absorb the weird rule ability "use magic to defeat magic", and become a monitor who fights against weirdness, and fights with his partners against the coming doomsday-level weirdness...
description.vi:
Sau khi xuyên không tới đất nước Nhật Bản trong thế giới song song, Kanbaru Shinji có được một quyển sổ ghi chép tên là Truyền Thuyết Đô Thị Thực Lục.
Mọi truyền thuyết đô thị cậu ghi vào đó đều có thể trở thành sự thật.
Mà Nhật Bản ở thế giới này còn thiếu khuyết rất nhiều truyền thuyết đô thị từng xuất hiện trong kiếp trước như là Hanako nhà vệ sinh, Thiếu Nữ Đến Từ Địa Ngục, Quý bà Hachishaku, Cuộc gọi của Mary, Con Mắt Trong Khe Hở...
Kanbaru Shinji: “Để ta khiến cho Nhật Bản này quần ma loạn vũ đi!”
Tóm tắt theo tiểu thuyết gốc, bản manhua đã chỉnh sửa rất nhiều từ tên nhân vật cho đến bối cảnh, vui lòng theo dõi truyện để biết thêm chi tiết.

title.en: Gendai Shakai de Otome Game no Akuyaku Reijou wo Suru no wa Chotto Taihen

altTitles.ja: 現代社会で乙女ゲームの悪役令嬢をするのはちょっと大変

altTitles.ja-ro: Gendai Shakai de Otome Game no Akuyaku Reijou o Suru no wa Chotto Taihen

altTitles.en: Modern Villainess: It’s Not Easy Building A Corporate Empire Before The Crash

altTitles.id: Tidak mudah membangun kerajaan perusahaan sebelum runtuh

description.en: In the tough times after the Japanese economic bubble burst, a career woman suffering through the aftermath reincarnates as Keikain Runa, the villainess of an otome game with a modern setting! However, not long after reincarnating, she realizes just how dire a situation her family is in due to the ongoing financial recession. Using knowledge from her previous life, Runa sets out to rescue her new family from crisis and stand against the tide of 'the times' that caused her past life to end in misery.
description.id:
Saya bereinkarnasi sebagai putri jahat dalam game otome berdasarkan dunia modern.

Tetapi karena ini adalah dunia modern, kehidupan lambat seorang penjahat memiliki banyak kesulitan, dan sejarah Jepang modern, sejarah ekonomi modern, dan ekonomi global menyerang karakter utama saat dia mencoba mengatur urusan rumah tangga.

Bertahanlah, penjahat! Jangan kalah, penjahat!

Ini adalah kisah tentang perjuangan Keikain Runa, seorang putri jahat yang melemparkan dirinya ke dalam pemalsuan sejarah dan perang uang, meninggalkan karakter utama dan target penangkapan untuk menjalani kehidupan yang lambat, dengan latar belakang Perang Dunia yang hilang , runtuhnya gelembung ekonomi, dan krisis keuangan yang mengancam.
description.ja:
バブル崩壊以降長く続く不況に沈む日本――。厳しい時代の中で不遇に喘ぐ女性が、失意のうちに命を落とした。しかし彼女の運命はそこで終わらず、目を覚ますと“現代”を舞台にした乙女ゲームの悪役令嬢・桂華院瑠奈に転生を果たす！時はバブル崩壊直後、転生からほどなくして生家が危機に瀕するも、前世の知識を駆使して平成の一大特需“ITバブル”に乗ることに成功。莫大な利益を手にした瑠奈は、破滅の運命を回避――したはずだった･･･。

「これは、私達が時代に行う復讐の物語よ」

A B-Rank Adventurer With an Evil Face Becomes a Father for the Hero and His Childhood Friends

description.en:
Gray, a B-rank adventurer, was supposed to be just a mob character in the RPG *Bright Fantasy*. However, by chance, he saved an orphan who was attacked by thugs on the roadside and decided to raise him as his father. But the orphan turned out to be the protagonist of this world, “Isuka”!

This choice would greatly change the fate of the world.

**Note:** While even the English on the Japanese covers gets this wrong, the orphan saved is the *protagonist*, not the *hero*.
___
**Character Designer:** [Hara Kazuhiro](https://mangadex.org/author/edaf7a28-c9c9-4b83-a3be-4087b3e4fcae)
description.pt-br: Gray, um aventureiro de nível B, deveria ser apenas um personagem da máfia no RPG “Bright Fantasy”. Porém, por acaso, ele salvou um órfão que foi atacado por bandidos na beira da estrada e decidiu criá-lo como pai. Mas o órfão acabou por ser o herói deste mundo, “Iska”. Essa escolha mudaria muito o destino do mundo.

Halo, the best musician of the time, suffers a traffic accident on the way to the Grammy ceremony. And when he regains consciousness, he finds himself in the body of a little Korean boy named No Hae-il. He finds himself in a completely different place and time. He confirms that No Hae-il's English name is Halo and feels a strong destiny. Halo, who entered Hae-il, proves to be a musical genius at this time as well.

altTitles.ja: 沖縄で好きになった子が方言すぎてツラすぎる

altTitles.en: The Girl I Fell in Love With in Okinawa Speaks in a Heavy Dialect and It's Too Much of a Pain

altTitles.ru: Девушка, в которую я влюбился на Окинаве, говорит на очень трудном диалекте, и с ней сложно общаться

altTitles.en: OKITSURA: Fell in Love with an Okinawan Girl, but I Just Wish I Know What She's Saying

description.en: I, Nakamura Teruaki, transferred to Okinawa and I'm in love with Kyan, but I don't understand her dialect. Higa is always helping me out by interpreting the dialect...
description.ja: 俺・中村照秋は、沖縄に転校し、好きな人も出来たが、喜屋武さん(好きな人)の方言が分からない。好きな人の方言を通訳してくれる比嘉さんには、いつも助けられてばかりいる…。 南の島でちょっぴり変わった異文化恋愛スタート‼
description.ru: Я, Тэруаки Накамура, перевёлся в школу на Окинаве и влюбился в девушку по имени Кян-сан, но я не понимаю её диалект. Хига-сан всегда помогает мне, переводя диалект. На южном острове начинается несколько иная культурная любовь.
description.pt-br: Eu, Nakamura Teruaki, me transferi para Okinawa e estou apaixonado pela Kyan, mas não entendo seu dialeto. Higa está sempre me ajudando interpretando o dialeto... Um romance intercultural um pouco incomum em uma ilha tropical está prestes a começar!

altTitles.ja: エイティエイトを2でわって

description.en:
Mitsuru Fujita is a girl who loves playing piano. When she moves into her high school dormitory, her roommate is Kanade Kobayashi, a former rival at piano competitions. She was hailed as a prodigy, but Kanade has given up the piano due to trauma she suffered while studying abroad. Until Mitsuru invites Kanade to play a duet with her…

(Source: Manga Time Kirara, translated)

Jinwoo Kim had been slaving as an assistant writer for 6 years with nothing to show for it. He quits his workplace. Later, he abruptly has a notification pop up and now he has scenes popping into his head and system prompts telling him he must be at a location to write. Maybe this is how he will become a star writer??
description.ko:
어느 날 갑자기 생긴 글 쓰는 능력,
보조작가로 구르던 나 김진우에게도 스타작가의 길이 열렸다! 가즈아~~!
.
.

장소 : 한라산/제한 시간 : 20시간]

description.de:
Damals hatte Dokja noch überhaupt keine Ahnung. Er hatte keine Ahnung, dass sein Lieblings-Web-Roman ‘Drei Wege um die Apokalypse zu überleben’ Realität wird und dass er der einzige ist, der weiß wie der Weltuntergang aussehen wird. Er hatte auch keine Ahnung, dass er letztendlich der Protagonist von diesem Roman werden würde. Jetzt begibt sich Dokja auf eine Reise, um den Lauf der Geschichte zu ändern und die Menschheit zu retten!

description.en: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.
description.es:
En ese entonces, Dokja no tenía idea de que su novela web favorita, Tres maneras de sobrevivir al apocalipsis, cobraría vida y que solo él sabría cómo iba a terminar el mundo. Tampoco tenía idea de que se convertiría en el protagonista de esta novela transformada en realidad. Ahora Dokja debe embarcarse en un viaje para alterar el curso de la historia y salvar a la humanidad de una vez por todas.

description.ja:
「ありえない...これは俺が知っている展開だ。」 10年以上読み続けた小説の最終話を読んだ日、世界は滅亡し小説の世界が現実となった。 平凡で冴えないサラリーマンの主人公・ドクシャ。 そんな彼の趣味はWEB小説『滅亡した世界で生き残る３つの方法』を読むこと。 ついに最終話を読み終えたかと思いきや、作者からのメッセージが届き小説のモンスターと登場人物が突如現れ、新たな世界が幕を開けた！ 「俺は、この世界の結末を知る唯一の読者となった。」 たった一人だけが読み終えたファンタジー小説が現実に。 果たしてドクシャは滅亡した世界を救うことができるのか？

纯情小白恋上高冷万人迷，

description.pt-br: Yeonwoo possui uma aparência tão delicada que poderia ser confundido com uma aluna. No entanto, ele tem uma paixão secreta pelo ídolo da escola, Kang Haesol. Mas o tímido Yeonwoo nunca disse uma palavra a ela...

description.en: Shin Young-jun, a sergeant chef, was greeted by the apocalypse just days before vacation. The battalion turned into chaos in an instant, and the communication network was cut off. Then something appeared before his eyes! [Congratulations on your awakening!] [Job: Novice Chef Lv.1] If I had been a warrior or an assassin, I would have tried to stand alone... What was assigned to him was chef, which is obviously a support job. There's nothing to be done if it's like this. "From here on, I will feed you."
description.ko:
말년 휴가를 며칠 앞둔 취사병 병장 신영준에게 멸망이 찾아왔다.
삽시간에 아비규환이 되어 버린 대대, 끊어져 버린 연락망.
눈 앞에 보이는 것은 하나!
[각성을 축하드립니다!][직업 : 신입 요리사 Lv.1]
차라리 전사, 암살자 같은 직업이었다면 홀로서기라도 시도해 보았을 것을…
그에게 주어진 것은 누가 봐도 서포터 직업인 요리사...

description.en: Sergeant ‘Burkey’ is a war hero from ‘Sun Empire’. An excellent master of martial arts and the loyalty she has shown to the emperor made her the role model of the Empire’s Soldiers, But behind all that and what anyone does not know, her ultimate goal was always to get revenge on the emperor by overthrowing the Empire. Can bucky get her revenge again the colossal empire?

Si-hyuk finds himself thrust into sudden responsibility when his parents tragically pass away in a car accident, leaving behind his much younger brother, Si-ha, who is two decades his junior. At the funeral, amidst the hushed murmurs of relatives, discussions arise about the uncertain future of the two brothers.

"What's the plan for those two? Who's going to step up?"
"Goodness, now that he's in college, how will he manage to care for his little brother?"
"Wasn't there some insurance payout?"

Amidst the chaos and uncertain discussions, Si-ha utters his first clear words. "Brother. Brother." It's a heartfelt cry, not for Mom or Dad, but for his older brother. Si-hyuk moves slowly toward Si-ha, embracing him tightly. "I'll take care of you," he whispers.

description.en:
Sato Itto, an ordinary salaryman, has been shy about love due to an old trauma. Then one day, a reunion is held for the first time in several years. While they are having a good time talking about the good old days, suddenly Hebo, who has become an idol currently on hiatus, decides to attend the reunion!

Sato is upset to see Hebo, who was his first love. He manages to get over it with the help of alcohol, which he does not normally drink. When he wakes up, he finds the two of them naked in the same bed. As Sato desperately tries to recall his memories, Hebo shockingly says to him...!

"Marry me..."

What will happen to the marriage between the two who have no experience with love...!?
description.ja:
いたって普通のサラリーマンの佐藤一途（さとういっと）は昔のトラウマで恋に奥手になっていた。そんなある日、数年ぶりに同窓会が開かれることに。昔話に花を咲かせていると、急にアイドル休止ほやほやの枦保（へぼ）さんが出席することに!? 初恋の人だった枦保さんを前に動揺する佐藤。普段の飲まないお酒の力を借りてなんとか乗り切るも目を覚ますと同じベッドに裸の二人。必死に記憶を思い出そうとする佐藤に枦保さんから衝撃の一言が…！

「結婚して…」

恋愛偏差値0同士の結婚の行方は果たして―――！？
description.pt-br:
Sato Itto, um assalariado comum, tem sido tímido em relação ao amor devido a um trauma antigo. Então, um dia, uma reunião é realizada pela primeira vez em vários anos. Enquanto eles se divertem conversando sobre os bons e velhos tempos, de repente Hebo, que se tornou uma Idol que está atualmente em hiato, decide participar da reunião!

Sato fica chateado ao ver Hebo, que foi seu primeiro amor. Ele consegue superar isso com a ajuda de álcool, que normalmente não bebe. Quando acorda, encontra os dois nus na mesma cama. Enquanto Sato tenta desesperadamente se lembrar de suas memórias, Hebo lhe diz, de forma chocante...!

“Se case comigo...”

O que acontecerá com o casamento entre os dois que não têm experiência com o amor...?

description.en: More than ten years have passed since a means of transporting individuals from Earth to another world was developed. High school student Kakeru Satomi was taught survival techniques and wisdom by his mountain-dwelling grandfather. Kakeru was sent to another world together with 100 other adventurers of the same age in order to take part in a training program to become an adventurer, but the portal device that linked Earth and the other world vanished right after their transfer...!
description.ja:
地球から異世界への転移装置が誕生して10余年――。里見カケルは、山で暮らす祖父から叩き込まれたサバイバル知識とスキルを持った高校生。冒険者になるための研修に参加するため、同世代の冒険者志願者100人とともに異世界へと転移したカケルだったが、直後に地球と異世界を繋いでいたポータルが消失してしまう…！！

description.en: Jongli Chu, a warrior of the Death Heavenly Sect who killed Hwang Jung to avenge his older brother. In order to avoid the pursuit of Death Heavenly Sect, he looked to an assassin of the Death Soul Agency, Crimson Assassin, for help and got swept into a huge mess known as the Obliteration. In order to escape the shadow of the Obliteration, he had no choice but to become a legendary Death God! Can Jong Lichu become a Death God and find freedom in the stifling rules created by the orthodox sects?

description.en: I woke up to find myself transmigrated into a novel as the “background character that's doomed to die.” Now stuck in the body of a six-year-old, I’ve got some serious challenges ahead of me. But I’m not about to let fate have its way. Even if I have to become the villain, I’ll do whatever it takes to survive!

Even he, Kang Geon-woo, a genius major leaguer who gained wealth, fame, and everything, could not continue a happy married life with his wife. He, who felt regretful about his wife's absence, returned to the past with the power of a mysterious ring.

As a high school student in the midst of a fresh romance, will he be able to find love this time?

description.en:
A world where you can form a pact with gods and gain skills. Born as the third son of a famous knight family, Yuno was so busy controlling his innate power that he was eventually called "incompetent.".
However, in the magical knight academy, where he was enrolled for some reason, he fulfilled his fateful encounter with an unnamed god who was despised as "incompetent" like himself..  
Yuno, who formed a pact with the goddess and named her [Athena], secretly decided to make her the highest god, and decided to get a little more serious.
description.fr: Un monde où l'on peut conclure un pacte avec les dieux et acquérir des compétences. Troisième fils d'une célèbre famille de chevaliers, Yuno était tellement occupé à contrôler son pouvoir inné qu'il a fini par être qualifié d'"incompétent"... Cependant, à l'académie des chevaliers magiques, où il était inscrit pour une raison quelconque, il a fait la rencontre fatidique d'un dieu sans nom qui était méprisé pour son "incompétence"...  Yuno, qui a conclu un pacte avec la déesse et l'a nommée [Athéna], a secrètement décidé de faire d'elle le dieu suprême, et a décidé d'être un peu plus sérieuse.
description.id:
Dunia di mana kau dapat membuat kontrak dengan dewa dan memperoleh skill. Terlahir sebagai putra ketiga dari keluarga ksatria terkenal, Yuno begitu sibuk mengendalikan kekuatan bawaannya sehingga dia akhirnya disebut sebagai "tidak kompeten".  
Tapi, di akademi ksatria sihir, dia terdaftar karena suatu alasan, dia bertemu dengan dewa yang dipandang rendah sebagai "tidak kompeten" seperti dirinya ..  
Yuno, yang membuat kontrak dengan dewa dan menamainya [Athena], diam-diam memutuskan untuk menjadikannya dewa tertinggi, dan memutuskan untuk menjadi sedikit lebih serius.
description.pt-br: Um mundo onde você pode fazer um contrato com Deus e ganhar habilidades. Nascido como o terceiro filho de uma famosa família de cavaleiros, Yuno estava tão ocupado controlando seu poder inato que acabou sendo chamado de "incompetente".No entanto, na academia do cavaleiro mágico, que foi matriculado por algum motivo, ele cumpriu seu encontro fatídico com um deus sem nome que era desprezado como "incompetente" como ele.Yuno, que fez um contrato com a deusa e a chamou de [Athena], secretamente decidiu torná-la a deusa suprema e decidiu levar um pouco mais a sério seu destino.

Continuation of the manga "Jesus". The legendary killer, hiding under the guise of school teacher Fujisawa Shingo, returns to Japan after more than ten years! What made him come back? What has he been doing for these ten years? Is one of his new students connected to 24?
Read on and find out in JESUS: Path of the Sandstorm!

description.en: After a traffic accident, 52-year-old civil servant Kenzaburou Tondabayashi awakens to find he's become Grace Auvergne, a duke's daughter, and more importantly the villainess of an otome game. Not wanting to get in the way of the happy endings of the young characters around him, Grace sets out to play the role of the villain, but whether it's due to Kenzaburou's memories of being an affectionate parent getting in the way or not being able to remember those pesky foreign names properly, it ends up being a lot harder than it looks…
description.id:
Setelah mengalami sebuah kecelakaan, seorang PNS berusia 52 tahun bernama kenzaburou tondabayashi tiba-tiba berada di tubuh seorang putri duke yang bernama grace auvergne, terlebih lagi, grace merupakan seorang villainess di sebuah game otome. Tidak ingin mengganggu happy ending anak-anak muda yang ada di dekatnya, grace memutuskan untuk menjalankan perannya sebagai seorang villainess, tapi mungkin karena ingatan kenzaburou yang dulunya merupakan seorang orang tua yang penuh kasih sayang atau karena tidak bisa mengingat nama-nama asing, akhirnya setiap grace ingin menjalankan peran villainessnya, grace selalu terganggu.
Sehingga dia merasa menjadi seorang villainess ternyata lebih sulit dari yang dia pikirkan...
description.ja: 52歳の真面目な公務員・屯田林憲三郎は交通事故に遭う。気が付いたらそこは学園舞台の乙女ゲームのような世界…しかも校内一高飛車なオーヴェルヌ侯爵家の令嬢グレイスに転生してしまい!?
description.es-la: Tras perder el conocimiento, después de realizar un acto heroico, el oficinista de 52 años, Kenzaburou Tondabayashi, despertó como Grace Auvergne, la hija de un duque perteneciente a un juego Otome y a su vez la villana de la historia. En un afán de querer cumplir su rol como villana para no afectar la historia del mundo, verá cómo su carácter de padre amoroso y de persona amable harán que su objetivo sea más difícil de lo que esperaba...

description.en: Komichi Shijou, the most famous person at her school, was troubled. Despite being a romantic comedy manga artist, she had no understanding of 'the feeling of love' was stuck in a creative slump. One day, a certain boy and girl appear before her. With their arrival, Komichi Shijou's investigation into 'genuine love' begins…!?
description.ja: 学校イチの有名人・四條恋路は悩んでました。なぜならラブコメ漫画家なのに、彼女には“恋する気持ち”がまったくわからず、スランプになってしまったからです。 そんな彼女の前にひと組の男女が現れます。その男女との出会いにより、彼女・四條恋路による“ホンモノの恋”への探求が始まるのでした…！？『恋愛』を綴る天才漫画家少女はホンモノの“恋”を知らないーー！？
description.pt-br: Komichi Shijou, a pessoa mais famosa da escola, estava preocupada. Apesar de ser uma artista de mangá de comédia romântica, ela não tinha nenhuma compreensão do "sentimento do amor" e estava presa em uma crise criativa. Um dia, um certo garoto e uma garota aparecem diante dela. Com a chegada deles, a investigação de Komichi Shijou sobre o "amor genuíno" começa...!?

description.en: I was reincarnated as “Luxe,” the villain with the “Evil Eye” that appears in the game, but I didn’t want to meet a miserable end after being reincarnated into my favorite game! I decided to find happiness, I started training in “Dark Magic” from that day on in order to fight off the forces that attacked me insearch of the Evil Eye. And eventually, I’ll become a mob that watches over… my favorite characters! This is the story of how I, who was reincarnated as the villain of my favorite game, and my efforts to change my fate.
description.ja:
大人気恋愛アクションRPG『ブレイズファンタジー』。
そこに登場する【魔眼】の悪役「リュクス」に転生してしまった俺だったが、大好きなゲームに転生したのに悲惨な最期を迎えたくない！
幸せになることを決意した俺は、魔眼を求めて襲ってくる勢力を退けるため、その日から「闇魔法」の修行を開始した。
そしてゆくゆくは……推しキャラを見守るモブになる!?

これは、大好きなゲームの悪役に転生してしまった俺が、
…

altTitles.vi: Ta Thật Không Phải Tà Thần Chó Săn

description.en: Lin Jie is an otherworlder who manages a bookstore. He’s kind and always recommends soul-healing books for his dejected customers. Sometimes he’d even share his own works too. As time goes on, these customers start to respect him a lot. They bring simple local products every day to show their gratitude and ask for book recommendations. They even start telling tales of this ordinary shopkeeper. His respectful and cordial titles include “Hyena of the Evil God”, “Herald of the Flesh Gospel”, “Author of Cultes des Goules” and “Shepherd of the Stars”???
description.uk: Лінь Цзє – чужоземець з іншого світу, що став тепер звичайним власником книжкового магазину. Він доброзичливий і завжди готовий порекомендувати відвідувачам книги, що здатні зцілити їхні душі. Іноді, він ділиться і власними роботами. З часом, клієнти починають його дуже поважати. Вони щодня приносять йому маленькі сувеніри чи подарунки в знак подяки та просять у нього рекомендації щодо книги. Про цього звичайного крамаря навіть починають розповідати історії. Його з повагою та теплом звуть «Гієна Злого Бога», «Вісник Євангелія Плоті», «Автор Культу Упирів» та «Пастух Зірок».
description.zh: 穿越者林介经营着一家书店。他善良热情，总是向失意潦倒的客人们推荐治愈心灵的书籍，偶尔也会安利一下自己的拙作。久而久之，这些客人变得非常尊敬他，每天都会带来一些朴实的土特产报答他，向他请教推荐书目，并且向周边人也诉说着这个普通书店老板的事迹。他们尊敬而亲切地称呼他为——“邪神的鬣狗”、“血肉福音书的传播者”、“尸食教典仪的撰写者”、“群星的牧羊人”。“？？？”

altTitles.ja: ボクを知りたすぎる清水さん

altTitles.en: Shimizu-san who wants to know me too much

description.en:
Atago Gato is a shy and reclusive high school boy. One day, while preparing for the school festival, a cute and cheerful classmate named Shimizu Roman finds out that he is aiming to become a manga artist. Isn't that amazing? The popular girl, who seems to live in a different world from him, takes an interest in him and asks him a lot of questions he never expected! When he confesses a traumatic experience after being criticized on SNS... Shimizu-san tries to help him overcome it in a slightly strange way...? A youthful romantic comedy in which a cheerful girl and a gloomy boy struggle to make manga!

(Source: AniList)
description.es: Atago Gato es un chico de instituto tímido y solitario. Un día, mientras se prepara para el festival escolar, una simpática y alegre compañera de clase llamada Shimizu Roman descubre que aspira a convertirse en dibujante de manga. ¿No es increíble? La chica popular, que parece vivir en un mundo distinto al suyo, se interesa por él y le hace un montón de preguntas que no esperaba. Cuando confiesa una experiencia traumática tras ser criticado en SNS... Shimizu-san intenta ayudarle a superarlo de una forma un tanto extraña...? ¡Una comedia romántica juvenil en la que una chica alegre y un chico sombrío luchan por hacer manga!
description.id:
Atago Gato adalah anak SMA yang pemalu dan tertutup. Suatu hari, saat mempersiapkan festival sekolah, teman sekelasnya yang lucu dan ceria bernama Shimizu Roman mengetahui bahwa dia bercita-cita menjadi seorang seniman manga. Bukankah itu luar biasa? Gadis populer, yang sepertinya hidup di dunia yang berbeda darinya, menaruh minat padanya dan menanyakan banyak pertanyaan yang tidak pernah dia duga! Saat dia mengakui pengalaman traumatis setelah dikritik di SNS... Shimizu-san mencoba membantunya mengatasinya dengan cara yang sedikit aneh...?
Sebuah komedi romantis masa muda di mana seorang gadis ceria dan seorang anak laki-laki muram berjuang untuk membuat manga!
description.ja: 陰キャで引っ込み思案の高校生・愛宕画人（あたごがくと）。ある日、文化祭の準備中に陽キャで可愛すぎる女子高生・清水ろまんに『マンガ家を目指している』ことがバレてしまう。「めっちゃスゴくない！？」住む世界が違うカノジョから興味を持たれて、まさかの質問攻め！？ SNSで批判されたトラウマを告白すると…清水さんは、ちょっぴりカゲキな方法で克服させようとしてきて――？　陽キャな女子と陰キャな男子がマンガ作りに奮闘する青春ラブコメ！
description.es-la: Atago Gato es un chico de instituto tímido y solitario. Un día, mientras se prepara para el festival escolar, una simpática y alegre compañera de clase llamada Shimizu Roman descubre que aspira a convertirse en dibujante de manga. ¿No es increíble? La chica popular, que parece vivir en un mundo distinto al suyo, se interesa por él y le hace un montón de preguntas que no esperaba. Cuando confiesa una experiencia traumática tras ser criticado en SNS... Shimizu-san intenta ayudarle a superarlo de una forma un tanto extraña...? ¡Una comedia romántica juvenil en la que una chica alegre y un chico sombrío luchan por hacer manga!

altTitles.ja: 鬼畜英雄

description.en:
It's been 10 years since Takamichi reincarnated in hell. His Incubus power becomes stronger by having sex with women, but his growth peaked. 

"I'll move to a new area, wait for me beautiful women of the new world!"
description.ja: タカミチは魔界に転生して10年。魔界最強の大魔剣士で次期魔王の座すら譲られるほどになっていた…が、悩んでいた。女性との行為によって強くなる『インキュバス』のスキルツリーは既に行き詰まっていたのだ。インキュバスのスキルツリーを解き明かすため、意を決してゲートをくぐるタカミチを待っていたのは…薬師の美少女アウラや魔眼の暗殺者バイオレットとの…エッロすぎる出会いだった（笑）
description.pt-br: 10 anos desde que ele reencarnou no inferno ... O herói “Takamichi” está com problemas. Com o poder do “Incubus” de ficar mais forte fazendo sexo com mulheres, ele já não tinha mais inimigos e seu crescimento atingiu o pico. “Vou me mudar para uma nova área, esperem por mim, lindas mulheres do novo mundo!” Fantasia de batalha de menina bonita sexy e violenta!

description.en: Orphan Ah Young is a financially struggling 23-year-old who takes care of her 8-year-old sister Dan Bi while juggling part-time jobs. One day a 28-year-old man Yoo Sang appears in front of Ah Young offering to be her dad through a signed agreement.
description.ko:
웹툰, 웹소설, CJ ENM DIA TV 웹드라마로 즐기는 <서류상 아빠>

23살에 28살짜리 아빠가 생겨 버렸다.

“그쪽만 원하신다면 제가 그쪽 아빠를 할까 합니다만.”

처음엔 신종 사기인가 생각했지만, 8살 동생과 나에겐 아빠가 필요했고, 그는 딸이 필요했다.

그렇게 임시 가족이 되었는데…….

“심장 괜찮아요?”
“심장요?”

겨우 5살 차이의 우리는 부녀라기에 어딘지 좀 이상하다. 

“아까 아영 씨 심장이 마구 뛴다고 했잖아요. 나도 그런데…….”

우리 이대로 괜찮을까?
